===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[bite]]; to [[snap]] at; to [[gnaw]]
#* {{zh-x|一 條 狗 咬 了 他 的 腿。|A dog '''snapped at''' his leg.}}
#* {{zh-x|他 被 響尾蛇 咬 過。|He had been '''bitten''' by a rattlesnake.}}
# to [[incriminate]]; to [[accuse]]
#* {{zh-x|他 站 在 被告 席 上，什麼 都 招認，什麼 人 都 '''咬'''。|He was in the public dock, confessing everything, '''implicating''' everybody.}}
# to [[articulate]]; to [[pronounce]]
#* {{zh-x|這 個 字 他 咬 得 很 准.|He can '''pronounce''' this word correctly.}}
# to be [[nitpicking]] on words
#* {{zh-x|別 老 咬 住 我 那 句 話 不 放|Don't keep nagging me about that remark of mine.}}
# {{lb|zh|neologism|euphonism}} {{zh-alt-form|口交|[[oral sex]]; to perform oral sex on}}
